name: The Mysterious Forest
description:
The Mysterious Forest

In this game you will get to play as a wanderer. Your starting location will be outside of the forest, and you will have a green path to follow in order to enter the forest. Once you enter the forest, you will deal with 2 side quests and 1 main quest. The two side quests are related to avoiding the giants ( Broodmother and Dragon ) and the other one is to kill the 30 enemies in the forest. Your main quest is to collect all the 255 coins in the map, and if you are injured from enemies, take the health potions located near every dragon statue.

If you fall over to the Lava, lost all health to enemies, or got too close to the giants then you will receive a game over screen to restart the game.

If you managed to collect all the 255 coins without dying then you will receive the victory screen.

Note: The animations of the enemies are bugged because I havn't worked on fixing the animations of the enemies yet.
